something_went_wrong: Sorry, something went wrong - please try again or contact us for help.

sharing_screenshot_toast_description.copied: Paste it to another application to share it with anyone as an image.
sharing_screenshot_toast_description.downloaded: Check your browser's downloads and share it with anyone as a file.

sharing_link_copied_toast_hint_descripti: Next time, go faster with the shortcut:

sharing_link_copied_toast_from_hotkeys_d.organization: Share it with anyone in your organisation to give access to this page.
sharing_link_copied_toast_from_hotkeys_d.public: Share it with anyone to give access to the selected content.

no_results_description: Please double check your search and active filters.
loading_error_banner_message: Some data on this page have failed to load. To retry, please use the reload button.
loading_error_banner_insight_message: Some of the data in this insight failed to load. To retry, please reload.
multiple_reloads_toast_description: It seems like something isn’t working as planned. We’ve already notified our support team and will look into it.
unavailable_breakdown_on_mobile: Currently unavailable on mobile. Please check desktop.
get_data_support: Get analytics support from Calliper data team

sharing_block_modal_share_with_team.body_title: Share a link with team members
sharing_block_modal_share_with_team.body_paragraph_1: This link will share the page exactly as you see it, including any data periods, filters or data splits selected.
sharing_block_modal_share_with_team.body_paragraph_2: New team members can sign up to Calliper with their company address for free and will automatically be added to your account.

sharing_block_modal_share_with_anyone.body_paragraph_1: This link can be open by anyone.
sharing_block_modal_share_with_anyone.body_paragraph_2: The page will be shared exactly as you see it, including any data periods, filters or data splits selected.

sharing_block_modal_embed.slack_body_instructions:
1. Copy the link below

2. Paste it in any Slack message

3. Chart will be generated as a preview when you send the message
sharing_block_modal_embed.notion_body_instructions:
1. Copy the link below

2. Paste it in any Notion Page

3. Select **Create Embed** from the drop down
sharing_block_modal_embed.tome_body_instructions:
1. Copy the link below  

2. Go to **More Tiles** menu on any presentation  

3. Select **Embed** and paste link
sharing_block_modal_embed.website_body_instructions:
1. Copy the code below

2. Paste it in any service that supports HTML iframes
